title: Huawei Watch_How can I start an exercise session and view data for an exercise session?
answer:
1.  Swipe left on the home screen, select **Fitness tracking** ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/73449_cv8sh.png) and then touch **Start** > **Time** or **Start** > **Calories**.
2.  Swipe up/down on the screen to set your goal, then touch **Start **to begin your exercise session.![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/7344a_0x9rn.gif) NOTE: 

*   Touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/7344b_mi1ht.png) to pause your session.
*   Touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/7344c_5kxr0.png) to view your exercise data.
